original_text: And when they had performed everything according to the Law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own town of Nazareth.
korean_text: 주의 율법을 따라 모든 일을 마치고 갈릴리로 돌아가 본 동네 나사렛에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had performed everything according to the Law of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 주의 율법을 따라 모든 것을 행하였을 때

sentences.original_text: to their own town of Nazareth
